name: Quake Live
description: This version uses DXVK, which greatly improves performance but may not work completely correctly.
content:
game:
  appid: 282440
system:
  disable_compositor: 'true'
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: devinfo,frametimes,fps
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
winesteam:
  esync: true
  dxvk: true
